name: ofmresex
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), universe), wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe), wcel(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe), wcel(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe), wcel(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe), wcel(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cres(cof(c0), cxp(c1, c2)), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))

comment: Existence of a restriction of the function operation map. (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2014.)
